name: The Crawling Impossibilities
description:
This game have a structure similar to a joke where ending is a punchline and entire rest of the game with waking up in a nightmarish school and exploring it is a setup.

But don't let this describtion to confuse you. Setup is to give you chills and punchlines serves rather shock value than laugh.

Unless you have very morbid sense of humor.

The Crawling Impossibilities is my first completed RPGMaker project and teaser for future activity.

Conrols:

- arrow keys to move

- Esc or X to perform special gesture.

Pros:

-  Creepy atmosphere.

- Four endings, each sick in a different way.

Cons:

- Very short gameplay. You can beat this game in literally few minutes.

- Vague plot.
